alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 04 at 3:57AM CST until March 06 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Southern Lake and Southern Cook Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of heavy, wet snow and ice accumulations will likely make travel very difficult.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
